<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Determine a possible list of successors of a basic block based on the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// basic block machine operand being used inside the block. This should give</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// you the correct list of successor blocks in most cases except for things</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// like jump tables where the basic block references can&#39;t easily be found.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The MIRPRinter will skip printing successors if they match the result of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// this function and the parser will use this function to construct a list if</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// it is missing.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a5247dc29909dbdf0e1e7b26aa0b3451d">guessSuccessors</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MachineBasicBlock &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlight">                     SmallVectorImpl&lt;MachineBasicBlock&#42;&gt; &amp;Result,</span></CodeLine>
